mapper.select: SELECT grp.group_id, grp.group_category_id, grp.user_id, grp.group_title, grp.user_counting, grp.group_status, grp.create_date, grp.end_date, grp.group_post, grp.is_blinded, grp.chat_room_status FROM group_info AS grp WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM user_info WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ) AND group_status = 1 ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT grp.group_id, grp.group_category_id, grp.user_id, grp.group_title, grp.user_counting, grp.group_status, grp.create_date, grp.end_date, grp.group_post, grp.is_blinded, grp.chat_room_status FROM group_info AS grp JOIN user_info AS usr ON usr.user_id = grp.user_id WHERE grp.group_status = 1 AND usr.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY grp.group_id DESC
SELECT * FROM group_info ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1;
